name: Can you look after my plants?
name_original: Can you look after my plants?
description:
Dit you ever had to look after the plants of someone who's on holiday? And were you always afraid they would die? No?

Now it's your change to prove to the world (and your grandma in particular) that you can look after the plants. While she is away for a month, you have to water them or not. Good luck!

A little tip: Some plants need water every 3 days, others once every 14 days. Your plants probably get rotten if you water too much, haha. PS: Earn points to unlock the plant info.

Game made for Ludum Dare 46. Sprites, coding and music all made by me.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/can-you-look-after-my-plants
